caption:
This photograph features an elderly man holding two small printed photographs in his hands. The man wears silver-rimmed glasses and smokes a cigar, which he holds in his mouth. He is dressed in a plaid, short-sleeved shirt and appears to be sitting outdoors. The background of the image shows a large, industrial-looking vehicle, possibly a harvester or a dump truck, behind a chain-link fence, suggesting the setting could be near a farm or industrial site.

The photographs that the man holds each capture different scenes. One photo shows a tree in what looks like a park setting with a woman standing beneath the tree. The other photo depicts a child, likely taken near a road or a paved path with subtle hues of greenery around.

The image is shot in natural lighting, further supported by the soft, diffused light and a somewhat cloudy sky visible in the background. This setup conveys a sense of personal history or memory being shared by the man, emphasized by his direct and engaged expression towards the camera while showcasing the smaller photos.
title: Matthew vieira stands in the very place where, some thirty-five years ago, he took these pictures of his children.  At that time the area was wood island park (known earlier as world war i memorial park).  Since then the water has been filled in and the site has become part of Logan airport
